Subjects: historical poems; Otterburn, battle of (1388); Percy, Henry (Hotspur)

BLCottCleoCIV.First Lines:
Yt fell abowght the lamasse tydeWhan husbond wynnes ther
                    haye…
BLCottCleoCIV.Last Lines:
…To bryng hys sowlle to the blysse of hevenFor he was a
                    gentyll knyght

                    knight

57 stanzas only. ‘Finis’ written below last line by scribe
                    (f. 55).
BLHar293.Attributed Title:
A songe made in R.Z. his tyme of the Batelle at Otterburne betweene the
                    lord henry percye Earle of northomberland and the Earle douglas of Scotland Anno
                    1388 (f. 52)
